children.name: 管理层
children.description: Interactive authoring tools

children.name: 三级01
children.description: Web-based 'cloud' applications for authoring data visualisations

children.name: 四级01
children.description: An open-source platform for publishing charts on the web. Cloud-based or self-hosted.

children.name: 四级02
children.description: Spreadsheet in the cloud with charting

children.name: 四级03
children.description: Cloud-based interactive tool for creating data visualisations

children.name: 四级04
children.description: Open-source interactive tool for creating and exporting D3-like charts

children.name: Tableau Desktop
children.description: Powerful tool for data analytics and visualisation

children.name: Tableau Public
children.description: free version of Tableau Desktop where charts are public

children.name: 办公室
children.description: Code-based data visualisation creation

children.name: 三级03
children.description: The language behind most (all?) browser-based data visualisations

children.name: 四级03
children.description: Off-the-shelf pre-designed charts. Easy to use but less flexible.

children.name: 五级
children.description: A good selection of charts including bar, line, scatter, geo, pie, donut, org etc.

children.name: HighCharts
children.description: A well maintained commercial library of commonly used chart types

children.name: InfoVis
children.description: A lovely selection of charts including bar, pie, sunburst, icicle, network, trees etc.

children.name: Mapping
children.description: Libraries for visualising geographic data

children.name: 六级
children.description: Lovely vector based mapping library with good browser support

children.name: Leaflet
children.description: Tile-based mapping library

children.name: MetricsGraphics.js
children.description: Beautiful line, scatter and histogram charts built on top of D3

children.name: NVD3
children.description: A general purpose charting library built on top of D3

children.name: Sigma
children.description: Library for visualising networks

children.name: 四级04
children.description: For maximum flexibility, custom coding is the way to go. These libraries will lend a hand.

children.name: D3
children.description: The jewel in the crown of web-based data visualisation. A library packed full of components for building any data visualisation you can imagine.

children.name: Ractive
children.description: Relatively new, Ractive helps you make your HTML and SVG interactive

children.name: Raphaël
children.description: A general purpose drawing library with good browser support

children.name: Snap.svg
children.description: A modern version of Raphaël that supports modern browsers

children.name: Variance
children.description: A declarative, mark-up based data visualisation library

children.name: Vega
children.description: A declarative language for specifying data visualistions

children.name: Other
children.description: Non-JavaScript languages for producing web-based data visualisations

children.name: Python
children.description: Python's a very popular language in data science and is a pleasant language to learn and use

children.name: Bokeh
children.description: A powerful tool for producing interactive plots, dashboards and data applications

children.name: R
children.description: Very popular language for data science

children.name: Shiny
children.description: A platform for producing web applications using R

children.description: Code-based data visualisation creation
